reference.title: Specifications of GIF
reference.shortdesc: GIF has a variety of specifications that can be used. Knowing and understanding some of these are a way to better optimize how to use and create animated GIFs.

row.entry: A compression format that compresses images without affecting image quality.
An image has access of up to 256 colors.
Background color can be rendered transparent, adapting to another color specified by the browser.
can hold multiple images, making animation an option.
An interlaced GIF means it will slowly appear as a webpage loads, rather than rendering an outline frame of an image.
